t: Starbucks to sell Seattle's Best Coffee brand to Nestle | king5.com
s: Starbucks acquired Seattle’s Best Coffee in 2003 for $72 million. The deal gave Starbucks a lower-priced brand and access to Seattle’s Best contracts with grocers and food service providers. But Starbucks is currently focused on a costly makeover of its North American stores. The company said last month it plans to spend $450 million next year to make its stores more efficient. >>> Download KING 5+, our new Roku and Amazon ...
